repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.abstract: Correspondence about Railroad Pension Plans in Canada and Union participation among Railroad employees in Canada, 1971. Copies of the Constitution and by-laws, logbooks, and minutes, etc. of the Brotherhood of Locomotive Firemen; correspondence about Railroad Pension Plans in Canada and Union participation among Railroad employees in Canada, 1971.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: UTU Canada Records #5164. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
